content.text: Hello! What is your favorite thing to do in your spare time?
I enjoy watching foreign films and spending time with my family.
I love foreign films too! I am currently learning Italian and I like to watch Italian films to practice.
That is so interesting! I am Italian-American but I cannot speak any Italian.
You should look into taking some classes! It is a lot of fun and it is a great way to learn about a new culture.
I think I will! I have always wanted to learn to speak Italian.
That is great! I am sure you will do great.
Thank you! I am excited to start learning.
What are some of your favorite Italian films?
I love all of the Federico Fellini films. La Dolce Vita is one of my favorites.
That is a great film! I also love 8 1/2.
Me too! Those are two of my favorite films of all time.
I am glad you like them!
Thank you! I am excited to learn more about Italian cinema.
I am sure you will enjoy it
